bike.description: Platinum Series 6066 butted and hydroformed aluminum w/eccentric bottom bracket, G2 29" Geometry

Bontrager Race Singlespeed hubs, Bontrager Duster 29" rims(tubeless ready rim strips, valves and sealant sold separately)
